title: 1999/440/CFSP: Council Decision of 6 July 1999 concerning the extension of joint action 97/289/CFSP on the establishment of a European Union assistance programme to support the Palestinian Authority in its efforts to counter terrorist activities emanating from the territories under its control
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 6 July 1999
concerning the extension of joint action 97/289/CFSP on the establishment of a European Union assistance programme to support the Palestinian Authority in its efforts to counter terrorist activities emanating from the territories under its control
(1999/440/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: joint action 97/289/CFSP is hereby extended until 31 May 2002.

The European Union adviser and the European Union Special Representative for the MEPP shall coordinate their action in the field of security cooperation to ensure coherence of Union action in support of the MEPP.

joint action 97/289/CFSP will be reviewed no later than 30 June 2000 with a view to the possible adoption of a multi-annual programme and the establishment of a financial indicative amount for the remaining period.

This Decision shall take effect on the date of its adoption.
It shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1999.
For the Council
The President
T. HALONEN
(1) OJ L 120, 12.5.1997, p. 2.
